author: Denis
content: Amazon will fall like all the others whose 90% of their products come from China.

author: Colon Wrecker
content: Bullish: Great looking chart today!  We are squeezing some shorts today. If Nasdaq can gain the seasonal momentum we will rocket much higher very fast.

author: jvysz
content: Difficult to find a parking spot at Walmart this morning. Every checkout lane was open with lots of happy shoppers buying lots of stuff. I noticed some people were buying 95 inch televisions.

author: james
content: Tariffs gonna affect AMZN big time. Looking at 160s soon

author: Ralph
content: Most of products sold in Amazon comes from china if Trump’s tariffs plan take place I believe it will affect vendors who sell Chinese products in amazon. Well might be not good for $AMZN

author: kevin
content: Bullish: AMZN will have best year ever in 2025!!!

author: ron
content: Buy BUY Buy!! all aboard  going up!!!

author: Charles
content: Just remember this: Amazon is way more than online retail. Cloud growth and movie production alone is a beast.

author: Dan
content: I’ll take any stock that goes up 30% year over year.

author: Jason
content: Bullish: Big days ahead for AMZN.. Buy & hold for nice rewards!
